title: And This Is How You Play Yasuo in 11 Steps Literally!

embed.description: How to play yasuo in 11 simple steps! Background Music: Yakety sax Intro download link : http://ifreshd.com/top3-n4-svp34 Outro music: Bastille - Pompeii (Audien Remix) [Premiere]

body:
#Kappa

I have posted about my video around 2 weeks ago and my post got deleted cause apparently it was on the wrong discussion, so here I am posting about it again.

Hoping you guys can give me feedback on this first video and tell me what I can improve on etc.

replies.body: Funny video hahaha. Really looking forward to see the zed montage! Keep going :)
Nice vid though step 7 should be changed to "remind yourself that they are bronze"
Im working on a zed montage atm <3

You forgot the most important step  

spam your lvl 5/6/7 emote every chance you get

Quit being a bronze pleb, Kappa.

But yeah nice video, i like the style that you presented it in.

As an aside, i don't think posts should be deleted if they are in the wrong area, just tell them it's in the wrong area so they know and can move it next time.
